_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder), located at 2080 Rice Street, Maplewood, MN, is a production facility offering a wide range of dairy products. Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) uses Anhydrous Ammonia as a refrigerant at this facility to provide cooling for the production and storage areas. Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) refrigeration system is a closed loop system with normal operating pressures that range between a low side of 5" vac to a high side of 185 psi. Due to the ammonia system expansion done in 2003 the systems maximum intended inventory is 21,785 pounds.





Accidental Release and Emergency response Policies:

Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) has established steps to include initial training under the OSHA standard 29 CFR 1910.120 HAZWOPER. The facility has also established annual retraining for all personnel that are on the HAZMAT Team as well as periodic spill drills and plant wide evacuation drills to assure all employees are prepared in the event of an ammonia release. Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) has also coordinated efforts with the Maplewood Fire Department to establish a joint response program. Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) established plans and procedures are periodically reviewed and at least annually to assure that they are current and up to date.



Emergency Response Program:

Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) has trained personnel that are the refrigeration operators to assure they can perform their responsibilities and procedures safely. The refrigeration operators receive training on the ammonia system when there is a change in the system and at minimum of every three years. Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) has also trained personnel in the Hazardous Waste Operation and Emergency Response Program, OSHA 29 CFR 1910. 120 HAZWAOPER. The trained personnel have been trained at the level of the Technician Level Responder and also the Incident Commander on scene. The trained personn

el will assess each release situation and determine by the risk assessment the appropriate emergency response to initiate. This could be by simply tightening a packing nut or a flange bolt or initiating a system shut down. Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) has established a written operating procedure for the ammonia system and has included in the procedure the Emergency Shutdown and Isolation in the event of a release. Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) has also purchased Level A and Level B Chemical Suits, MSA Self Contained Breathing Apparatus and the other appropriate equipment to support the HAZMAT Team. The in-house HAZMAT Team will coordinate their efforts with the outside Emergency Services to assure safety for all personnel.



Five Year Accident History:

There have been no accidental releases in the past five years.



General Accidental Release Prevention Program and Chemical Specific Prevention Steps:

Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder), located at 2080 Rice Street, Maplewood, MN, is a production facility offering a wide range of dairy products. Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) uses Anhydrous Ammonia as a refrigerant at this facility to provide cooling for the production and storage areas. Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) refrigeration system is a closed loop system with normal operating pressures that range between a low side of 5" vac to a high side of 185 psi. Due to the ammonia system expansion done in 2003 the systems maximum intended inventory is 21,785 pounds.



ASME Boiler & Pressure Valve Codes

ANSI B31.3 Piping Code

IIAR Industry guideline for safety and good engineering practices

NFPA guidelines for fire protection equipment



Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) through regular audits, training, maintenance, testing and inspections programs has established a history of safe operation and that the community emergency action plans are current and in place. Also that training with community services has bee

n done and is on going. This is to ensure that in the event of an accidental release Agropur Division Natrel USA (Schroeder) trained personnel and the community emergency services can minimize the release and stop it with no impact to the employees or the community.
